mapper.insert: insert into userinfo(pwd, name, urull, telcode, status, dptid, receivepackageid, delivepackageid, transpackageid) values (#{pwd},#{name},#{urull},#{telCode} ,#{status} ,#{dptid},#{receivePackageId} ,#{delivePackageId} ,#{transPackageId} );
mapper.select: select uid, pwd, name, urull, telcode, status, dptid, receivepackageid, delivepackageid, transpackageid from userinfo where uid=#{uid} and password=#{password};
